attributes.action: school start at 12 and end at 6:30pm
attributes.additional_details: So students can function properly and focus more
attributes.background: The government  can start schools later becaise if we get more sleep we would be able to concentrate better. Some people r tired due to the lack of sleep which causes us not being able to concentrate enough which shows how our gcse and SATs have a big impact. More the sleep we get more active.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action:

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
